subject: Basketball (College)
Apologies
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: New Mexico State Athletic Director McKinley Boston said Monday that the N.C.A.A. had apologized for making his team fly home immediately after its second-round tournament loss in Spokane, Wash.
snippet: New Mexico State Athletic Director McKinley Boston said Monday that the N.C.A.A. had apologized for making his team fly home immediately after its second-round tournament loss in Spokane, Wash.
